price: 87. (Xus qisada) rafiiqii nibriga (Yuunus) markuu tegay isagoo (u) cadheysan (dadkii loo  diray) 24, wuxuuna mooday inaanan cidhiidhyeyn (aanu qabanayn)25! Markaasuu ka dhawaaqay mugdiyo dhexdooda26 (isagoo leh): Ma jiro Ilaah (Xaq ah) aan Adiga aheyn (Allow). Adigaa ka hufan (xumaan), anigu  waan gefay.
arabic: وَذَا ٱلنُّونِ إِذ ذَّهَبَ مُغَٰضِبٗا فَظَنَّ أَن لَّن نَّقۡدِرَ عَلَيۡهِ فَنَادَىٰ فِي ٱلظُّلُمَٰتِ أَن لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّآ أَنتَ سُبۡحَٰنَكَ إِنِّي كُنتُ مِنَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
footnotes:
24. Ka cadheysan gaalnimada iyo caasiyoobidda dadkiisa. 
25. Macne kale waa aan ku cidhiidhyi doonin (caloosha nibriga).
 26. Mugdiyadaas oo ah mugdiga habeenka, kan badda, iyo kan caloosha nibriga.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wadhā al-nūni idh dhahaba mughāḍiban faẓanna an lan naqdira ʿalayhi fanādā fī al-ẓulumāti an lā ilāha illā anta sub'ḥānaka innī kuntu mina al-ẓālimīna
